snippet: Newt Gingrich is partial to the compare and contrast approach when speaking to crowds, and when he is done comparing and contrasting, President Obama is usually found wanting.
lead_paragraph: Newt Gingrich is partial to the compare and contrast approach when speaking to crowds, and when he is done comparing and contrasting, President Obama is usually found wanting.

headline.main: The Old Professor Brings Them to Their Feet
headline.print_headline: The Old Professor Brings Them to Their Feet
